r.d: The purpose of this driver is to provide exceptionally thin glue between MongoDB and PHP, implementing only fundamental and performance-critical components necessary to build a fully-functional MongoDB driver.
r.n: ** Task * [PHPC-2027] - Add PHP 8.1 to AppVeyor build matrix * [PHPC-2071] - Upgrade libbson and libmongoc to 1.20.1
